content: on tapestry needle and round 2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end use to attach pom pom weave in ends with tapestry round 3 repeat round 1 needle round 4 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end www kniterations ca ©kniterations 2017 all rights reserved do not duplicate or distribute slush v1 3 4 of 4 schematic share & connect join the kniterations community on facebook and instagram post using the hashtags #kniterations and #slushhat to share your project you can also join the kniterations ravelry group here also receive exclusive discounts and special offers and be the first to find out when new patterns are released by joining the kniterations mailing list plus receive a free pattern when you sign up here about allison allison o mahony is a knitting designer and technical editor who loves to create functional modern knitwear she can wear every day allison lives in st john s newfoundland canada where she can usually be found within arm s reach of her knitting bag and calculator and quite often either a coffee or a pint depending on the time of day email allison@kniterations ca ravelry kniterations website www kniterations ca facebook kniterations instagram @kniterations www kniterations ca ©kniterations 2017 all rights reserved do not duplicate or distribute
